name: GAMINSIDE
tag_list: gamified-loyalty-solutions, gamification, engagement, loyalty, saas, engagement-engine
overview:
Keep your audience loyal - totally engage them!

GAMINSIDE is a full-service provider for gamified loyalty and engagement solutions.
In addition to the Engagement Engine, which enables easy configuration of engagement programs including relationship and campaign management, reward shop administration and analytics, GAMINSIDE also provides full-range services such as reward sourcing, conceptual designs, ready to use frontend widgets, marketing features and mobile apps.

GAMINSIDE is focusing on cross-platform engagement which includes all touchpoints like browser, mobile, social networks and real-world.

The company is located in Vienna, Austria.
